ERROR_timeout.en_US: The linking system did not respond! Please contact our team!
ERROR_timeout.de_DE: Das Verlinkungssystem hat nicht reagiert! Bitte kontaktiere unser Team!
ERROR_timeout.pt_BR: O sistema de ligação não respondeu! Por favor, contacte a nossa equipa!
ERROR_timeout.es_ES: El sistema de enlace no ha respondido. Póngase en contacto con nuestro equipo.
ERROR_timeout.fr_FR: Le système de liaison n'a pas répondu ! Veuillez contacter notre équipe !
ERROR_timeout.tr_TR: Bağlantı sistemi yanıt vermedi! Lütfen ekibimizle iletişime geçin!

ERROR_response.en_US: &cThe linking system has sent an undefinable response! Please show the following text to a administrator: ""&6VAR1&c""
ERROR_response.de_DE: &cDas Verlinkungssystem hat eine undefinierbare Antwort gesendet! Bitte zeige den folgenden Text einem Administrator: ""&6VAR1&c""
ERROR_response.pt_BR: &cO sistema de ligação enviou uma resposta indefinível! Por favor, mostre o seguinte texto a um administrador: ""&6VAR1&c""
ERROR_response.es_ES: &c¡El sistema de enlace ha enviado una respuesta indefinible! Por favor, muestre el siguiente texto a un administrador: ""&6VAR1&c""
ERROR_response.fr_FR: &cLe système de liaison a envoyé une réponse indéfinissable ! Veuillez montrer le texte suivant à un administrateur : ""&6VAR1&c""
ERROR_response.tr_TR: &cBağlantı sistemi tanımlanamayan bir yanıt gönderdi! Lütfen aşağıdaki metni bir yöneticiye gösterin: ""&6VAR1&c""

VERIFY.web_missingcode.en_US: Please enter your code as second argument!
VERIFY.web_missingcode.de_DE: Bitte gib deinen Code als zweites Argument ein!
VERIFY.web_missingcode.pt_BR: Introduza o seu código como segundo argumento!
VERIFY.web_missingcode.es_ES: Introduzca su código como segundo argumento.
VERIFY.web_missingcode.fr_FR: Veuillez saisir votre code comme deuxième argument !
VERIFY.web_missingcode.tr_TR: Lütfen kodunuzu ikinci bağımsız değişken olarak girin!

VERIFY.web_wrongcode.en_US: &cNo account could be found with the code &6VAR1&c! &7Please check if you entered the correct code!
VERIFY.web_wrongcode.de_DE: &cEs konnte kein Account mit dem Code &6VAR1 &cgefunden werden! &7Bitte überprüfe, ob du den richtigen Code eingegeben hast!
VERIFY.web_wrongcode.pt_BR: &cNão foi possível encontrar nenhuma conta com o código &6VAR1&c! &7Por favor, verifique se introduziu o código correto!
VERIFY.web_wrongcode.es_ES: &cNo se ha encontrado ninguna cuenta con el código &6VAR1&c! &7¡Por favor, compruebe si ha introducido el código correcto!
VERIFY.web_wrongcode.fr_FR: &cAucun compte n'a pu être trouvé avec le code &6VAR1&c ! &7Vérifiez si vous avez introduit le bon code !
VERIFY.web_wrongcode.tr_TR: &cHiçbir hesap &6VAR1&c kodu ile bulunamadı! &7Lütfen doğru kodu girip girmediğinizi kontrol edin!

VERIFY.web_success.en_US: &aYour account on our website has been successfully verified!
VERIFY.web_success.de_DE: &aDein Account auf unserer Webseite wurde erfolgreich verifiziert!
VERIFY.web_success.pt_BR: &aA sua conta no nosso sítio Web foi verificada com êxito!
VERIFY.web_success.es_ES: &aSu cuenta en nuestro sitio web se ha verificado correctamente.
VERIFY.web_success.fr_FR: &aVotre compte sur notre site a été vérifié avec succès !

NO_spam.en_US: Please do not spam this command!
NO_spam.de_DE: Bitte spammen Sie diesen Befehl nicht!
NO_spam.pt_BR: Por favor, não envie este comando por spam!
NO_spam.es_ES: Por favor, no envíe spam con este comando.
NO_spam.fr_FR: Merci de ne pas spammer cette commande !

LINK_already_connected.en_US: &cThis Minecraft account is already linked with the Discord account &6VAR1&c! Use the command &6&n</unlink> &cto unlink the accounts!
LINK_already_connected.de_DE: &cDieser Minecraft-Account ist bereits mit dem Discord-Account &6VAR1&c verlinkt! Benutze den Befehl &6&n</unlink> &cum die Accounts zu trennen!
LINK_already_connected.pt_BR: &cEsta conta do Minecraft já está vinculada à conta do Discord &6VAR1&c! Use o comando &6&n</unlink> &cpara desvincular as contas!
LINK_already_connected.es_ES: &c¡Esta cuenta de Minecraft ya está vinculada a la cuenta de Discord &6VAR1&c! Usa el comando &6&n</unlink> &cpara desvincular las cuentas.
LINK_already_connected.fr_FR: &cCe compte Minecraft est déjà lié au compte Discord &6VAR1&c ! Utilisez la commande &6&n</unlink> &cpour dissocier les comptes !
LINK_already_connected.tr_TR: &cBu Minecraft hesabı zaten &6VAR1&c Discord hesabıyla bağlantılı! Hesapları ayırmak için &6&n</unlink> &ckomutunu kullanın!

LINK_wrong_secret.en_US: The code you entered is incorrect!
LINK_wrong_secret.pt_BR: O código que introduziu está incorreto!
LINK_wrong_secret.fr_FR: Le code que vous avez saisi est incorrect !

LINK_secret_already_generated.en_US: &7Your code has already been generated (<#F7E617>VAR1&7)! Use the command &e</link code:VAR1> &7in any channel on our Discord server!
LINK_secret_already_generated.de_DE: &7Dein Code wurde bereits generiert (<#F7E617>VAR1&7)! Benutze den Befehl &e</link code:VAR1> &7in einem beliebigen Kanal auf unserem Discord-Server!
LINK_secret_already_generated.pt_BR: &7Seu código já foi gerado (<#F7E617>VAR1&7)! Use o comando &e</link code:VAR1> &7em qualquer canal do nosso servidor Discord!
LINK_secret_already_generated.es_ES: &7¡Tu código ya ha sido generado (<#F7E617>VAR1&7)! Usa el comando &e</link code:VAR1> &7en cualquier canal de nuestro servidor de Discord.
LINK_secret_already_generated.fr_FR: &7Votre code a déjà été généré (<#F7E617>VAR1&7) ! Utilisez la commande &e</link code:VAR1> &7dans n'importe quel canal de notre serveur Discord !
LINK_secret_already_generated.tr_TR: &7Kodunuz zaten oluşturuldu (<#F7E617>VAR1&7)! Kodunuzu kullanmak için &e</link code:VAR1> &7komutunu Discord sunucumuzdaki herhangi bir kanalda kullanın!

LINK_secret_newly_generated.en_US: &aYour code has successfully been generated (<#F7E617>VAR1&a)! &7Use the command &e</link code:VAR1> &7in any channel on our Discord server to link your accounts!
LINK_secret_newly_generated.de_DE: &aDein Code wurde erfolgreich generiert (<#F7E617>VAR1&a)! &7Benutze den Befehl &e</link code:VAR1> &7in einem beliebigen Kanal auf unserem Discord-Server, um deine Accounts zu verknüpfen!
LINK_secret_newly_generated.pt_BR: &aSeu código foi gerado com sucesso (<#F7E617>VAR1&a)! &7Use o comando &e</link code:VAR1> &7em qualquer canal do nosso servidor Discord para vincular suas contas!
LINK_secret_newly_generated.es_ES: &a¡Tu código ha sido generado con éxito (<#F7E617>VAR1&a)! &7Usa el comando &e</link code:VAR1> &7en cualquier canal de nuestro servidor de Discord para vincular tus cuentas.
LINK_secret_newly_generated.fr_FR: &aVotre code a été généré avec succès (<#F7E617>VAR1&a) ! &7Utilisez la commande &e</link code:VAR1> &7dans n'importe quel canal de notre serveur Discord pour lier vos comptes !
LINK_secret_newly_generated.tr_TR: &aKodunuz başarıyla oluşturuldu (<#F7E617>VAR1&a)! &7Hesaplarınızı bağlamak için &e</link code:VAR1> &7komutunu Discord sunucumuzdaki herhangi bir kanalda kullanın!

LINK_connection_success_normal.en_US: &aSuccessfully linked your Minecraft account to the Discord account &eVAR1&a!
LINK_connection_success_normal.de_DE: &aDu hast deinen Minecraft-Account erfolgreich mit dem Discord-Account &eVAR1 &averknüpft!
LINK_connection_success_normal.pt_BR: &aLigaste com sucesso a tua conta Minecraft à conta Discord &eVAR1&a!
LINK_connection_success_normal.es_ES: &a¡Has vinculado correctamente tu cuenta de Minecraft a la cuenta de Discord &eVAR1&a!
LINK_connection_success_normal.fr_FR: &aVous avez réussi à lier votre compte Minecraft au compte Discord &eVAR1 &a!

LINK_connection_success_normal_msg.en_US: &7Your Minecraft VAR1 account &eVAR2 &7is now linked to the Discord account &eVAR3&7!
LINK_connection_success_normal_msg.pt_BR: &7A tua conta VAR1 do Minecraft &eVAR2 &7está agora ligada à conta do Discord &eVAR3&7!
LINK_connection_success_normal_msg.es_ES: &7¡Tu cuenta Minecraft VAR1 &eVAR2 &7está ahora vinculada a la cuenta Discord &eVAR3&7!
LINK_connection_success_normal_msg.fr_FR: &7Votre compte Minecraft VAR1 &eVAR2 &7est maintenant lié au compte Discord &eVAR3 &7!

LINK_connection_success_add.en_US: &aSuccessfully added this Minecraft VAR1 account to the account link between your Discord account &eVAR3 &aand your Minecraft VAR2 account &eVAR4&a!
LINK_connection_success_add.de_DE: &aDieser Minecraft-VAR1-Account wurde erfolgreich zur Account-Verknüpfung zwischen deinem Discord-Account &eVAR3 &aund deinem Minecraft-VAR2-Account &eVAR4 &ahinzugefügt!
LINK_connection_success_add.pt_BR: &aAdicionei com sucesso esta conta Minecraft VAR1 à ligação de conta entre a tua conta Discord &eVAR3 &ae a tua conta Minecraft VAR2 &eVAR4&a!
LINK_connection_success_add.es_ES: &a¡Ha añadido con éxito esta cuenta Minecraft VAR1 al enlace de cuenta entre su cuenta Discord &eVAR3 &ay su cuenta Minecraft VAR2 &eVAR4&a!
LINK_connection_success_add.fr_FR: &aAj'ai ajouté avec succès ce compte Minecraft VAR1 au lien de compte entre votre compte Discord &eVAR3&a et votre compte Minecraft VAR2 &eVAR4&a !
LINK_connection_success_add.tr_TR: &aBu Minecraft VAR1 hesabını Discord hesabınız &eVAR3 &ave Minecraft VAR2 hesabınız &eVAR4&a arasındaki hesap bağlantısına başarıyla ekledik!

LINK_connection_success_add_msg.en_US: &7Your Minecraft VAR1 account &eVAR2 &7was added to the link between your Discord account &eVAR3 &7and your Minecraft VAR4 account &eVAR5&7!
LINK_connection_success_add_msg.de_DE: &7Dein Minecraft-VAR1-Account &eVAR2 &7wurde der Verknüpfung zwischen deinem Discord-Account &eVAR3 &7und deinem Minecraft-VAR4-Account &eVAR5 &7hinzugefügt!
LINK_connection_success_add_msg.pt_BR: &7A tua conta VAR1 do Minecraft &eVAR2 &7foi adicionada à ligação entre a tua conta Discord &eVAR3 &7e a tua conta Minecraft VAR4 &eVAR5&7!
LINK_connection_success_add_msg.es_ES: &7¡Tu cuenta Minecraft VAR1 &eVAR2 &7fue añadida al enlace entre tu cuenta Discord &eVAR3 &7y tu cuenta Minecraft VAR4 &eVAR5&7!
LINK_connection_success_add_msg.fr_FR: &7Ton compte Minecraft VAR1 &eVAR2 &7a été ajouté au lien entre ton compte Discord &eVAR3 &7et ton compte Minecraft VAR4 &eVAR5 &7!
LINK_connection_success_add_msg.tr_TR: &7Minecraft VAR1 hesabınız &eVAR2&7, Discord hesabınız &eVAR3 &7ve Minecraft VAR4 hesabınız &eVAR5 &7arasındaki bağlantıya eklendi!

UNLINK_success_dissolve_msg.en_US: &7The link between your Minecraft accounts and your Discord account &eVAR3 &7has been removed!
UNLINK_success_dissolve_msg.de_DE: &7Die Verknüpfung zwischen deinen Minecraft Accounts und deinem Discord-Account &eVAR3 &7wurde entfernt!
UNLINK_success_dissolve_msg.pt_BR: &7A ligação entre as vossas contas Minecraft e a vossa conta Discord &eVAR3 &7foi removida!
UNLINK_success_dissolve_msg.es_ES: &7¡El enlace entre tus cuentas de Minecraft y tu cuenta de Discord &eVAR3 &7ha sido eliminado!
UNLINK_success_dissolve_msg.fr_FR: &7Le lien entre vos comptes Minecraft et votre compte Discord &eVAR3 &7a été supprimé !
UNLINK_success_dissolve_msg.tr_TR: &7Minecraft hesaplarınız ve Discord hesabınız arasındaki bağlantı &eVAR3 &7kaldırıldı!

UNLINK_success_remove_msg.en_US: &7Your Minecraft VAR1 account &eVAR2 &7has been removed from the link between your Discord account &eVAR3 &7and your Minecraft VAR4 account &eVAR5&7!
UNLINK_success_remove_msg.de_DE: &7Dein Minecraft-VAR1-Account &eVAR2 &7wurde aus der Verknüpfung zwischen deinem Discord-Account &eVAR3 &7und deinem Minecraft-VAR4-Account &eVAR5 &7entfernt!
UNLINK_success_remove_msg.pt_BR: &7A tua conta VAR1 do Minecraft &eVAR2 &7foi removida da ligação entre a tua conta Discord &eVAR3 &7e a tua conta VAR4 do Minecraft &eVAR5&7!
UNLINK_success_remove_msg.es_ES: &7¡Tu cuenta de Minecraft VAR1 &eVAR2 &7ha sido eliminada del enlace entre tu cuenta de Discord &eVAR3 &7y tu cuenta de Minecraft VAR4 &eVAR5&7!
UNLINK_success_remove_msg.fr_FR: &7Votre compte Minecraft VAR1 &eVAR2 &7a été supprimé du lien entre votre compte Discord &eVAR3 &7et votre compte Minecraft VAR4 &eVAR5 &7!
UNLINK_success_remove_msg.tr_TR: &7Minecraft VAR1 hesabınız &eVAR2&7, Discord hesabınız &eVAR3 &7ve Minecraft VAR4 hesabınız &eVAR5 &7arasındaki bağlantıdan kaldırıldı!

UNLINK_success_normal.de_DE: &7Du hast erfolgreich deine Discord- und Minecraft-Konten &cgetrennt!
UNLINK_success_normal.pt_BR: &cDesvinculaste &7com sucesso as tuas contas Discord e Minecraft!
UNLINK_success_normal.es_ES: &7¡Has &cdesvinculado &7con éxito tus cuentas de Discord y Minecraft!
UNLINK_success_normal.fr_FR: &7Vous avez réussi à &cdissocier &7vos comptes Discord et Minecraft !

UNLINK_success_edition.de_DE: &7Du hast erfolgreich deine Discord- und Minecraft-VAR1-Konten &cgetrennt&7!
UNLINK_success_edition.pt_BR: &cDesvinculaste &7com sucesso as tuas contas Discord e Minecraft VAR1!
UNLINK_success_edition.es_ES: &7¡Has &cdesvinculado &7con éxito tus cuentas de Discord y Minecraft VAR1!
UNLINK_success_edition.fr_FR: &7Vous avez réussi à &cdissocier &7vos comptes Discord et Minecraft VAR1 !
UNLINK_success_edition.tr_TR: &7Discord ve Minecraft VAR1 hesaplarınızın bağlantısı başarıyla &ckaldırıldı&7!

UNLINK_no_connection.en_US: &cThis Minecraft account isn't linked to a discord account!
UNLINK_no_connection.de_DE: &cDieser Minecraft-Account ist mit keinem Discord-Account verknüpft!
UNLINK_no_connection.pt_BR: &cEsta conta Minecraft não está ligada a uma conta Discord!
UNLINK_no_connection.es_ES: &cEsta cuenta de Minecraft no está vinculada a una cuenta de Discord.
UNLINK_no_connection.fr_FR: &cCe compte Minecraft n'est pas lié à un compte Discord !
UNLINK_no_connection.tr_TR: &cBu Minecraft hesabı bir Discord hesabına bağlı değil!

UNLINK_not_connected_edition.en_US: &cThere is no Minecraft VAR1 account linked to your Discord account!
UNLINK_not_connected_edition.de_DE: &cEs ist kein Minecraft-VAR1-Account mit deinem Discord-Account verknüpft!
UNLINK_not_connected_edition.pt_BR: &cNão existe uma conta Minecraft VAR1 ligada à tua conta Discord!
UNLINK_not_connected_edition.es_ES: &c¡No hay ninguna cuenta de Minecraft VAR1 conectada a tu cuenta de Discord!
UNLINK_not_connected_edition.fr_FR: &cIl n'y a pas de compte Minecraft VAR1 connecté à votre compte Discord !
UNLINK_not_connected_edition.tr_TR: &cDiscord hesabınıza bağlı bir Minecraft VAR1 hesabı yok!

UNLINK_multiple_accounts.en_US: &7Your Discord account is linked to both your Minecraft Java and Bedrock accounts! Please enter the argument ""&ejava&7"" to remove your Java account, ""&ebedrock&7"" to remove your bedrock account or ""&eVAR1&7"" to remove all accounts.
UNLINK_multiple_accounts.de_DE: &7Dein Discord-Account ist sowohl mit deinem Minecraft-Java- als auch deinem Bedrock-Account verknüpft! Bitte gib das Argument ""&ejava&7"" ein, um deinen Java-Account zu entfernen, ""&ebedrock&7"", um deinen Bedrock-Account zu entfernen oder ""&eVAR1&7"", um alle Accounts zu entfernen.
UNLINK_multiple_accounts.pt_BR: &7A tua conta Discord está ligada às tuas contas Java e Bedrock do Minecraft! Introduza o argumento ""&ejava&7"" para remover a sua conta Java, ""&ebedrock&7"" para remover a sua conta Bedrock ou ""&eVAR1&7"" para remover todas as contas.
UNLINK_multiple_accounts.es_ES: &7Tu cuenta de Discord está vinculada a tus cuentas de Minecraft Java y Bedrock. Introduce el argumento ""&ejava&7"" para eliminar tu cuenta Java, ""&ebedrock&7"" para eliminar tu cuenta Bedrock o ""&eVAR1&7"" para eliminar todas las cuentas.
UNLINK_multiple_accounts.fr_FR: &7Votre compte Discord est lié à la fois à votre compte Minecraft Java et à votre compte Bedrock ! Veuillez saisir l'argument ""&ejava&7"" pour supprimer votre compte Java, ""&ebedrock&7"" pour supprimer votre compte Bedrock ou ""&eVAR1&7"" pour supprimer tous les comptes.
UNLINK_multiple_accounts.tr_TR: &7Discord hesabınız hem Minecraft Java hem de Bedrock hesaplarınıza bağlı! Lütfen Java hesabınızı kaldırmak için ""&ejava&7"", Bedrock hesabınızı kaldırmak için ""&ebedrock&7"" veya tüm hesapları kaldırmak için ""&eVAR1&7"" argümanını girin.
